title: Handle the Death of an Employee
description: HR has been notified that an active employee has passed away.

tasks.description: Verify the information and express condolences to the family.
tasks.expected_outcome: The HRBP confirms the sad news and speaks with the family.

tasks.description: Work with the family and the company's life insurance provider to process the claim.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP facilitates the life insurance claim process.

tasks.description: Process the final paycheck and coordinate the return of company property with the employee's family.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP sensitively handles all final administrative tasks related to the employee's separation.
